text: @realDonaldTrump Does #TaylorSwift see these med. personnel as #racist when mention words of COLOR? & #Trump doesn't mention words of COLOR at all.:  Researchers tested 4,160 people for coronavirus in a San Francisco neighborhood.Not a single wt. person tested positive.https://t.co/IdTSECs8xI

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
